caption: The divine journey unfolds through sacred signs and transformative teachings that illuminate the world.
image_prompt: A triptych-style illustration showing three key moments: left panel shows a boy in a temple astonishing learned scholars with wisdom, middle panel depicts a man at a river with heavens torn open and a dove descending amid radiant light, right panel shows a wedding feast where water transforms into glowing wine in stone jars. The art style evokes sacred Renaissance manuscripts with gold leaf illumination, rich colors, and divine light emanating from each scene, creating a cohesive narrative of spiritual revelation and transformation.
